snippet: Even in hot Saudi Arabia, a sweater can come in handy.
abstract: Helene Cooper, former White House correspondent for the New York Times, offers advice for packing light when traveling.
lead_paragraph: Even in hot Saudi Arabia, a sweater can come in handy.

headline.seo: Travel Advice from a White House Correspondent
headline.main: Chasing Presidents in Blue Frye Boots
headline.print_headline: Chasing Presidents in Blue Frye Boots
